title: [The Slope, Canyon Floor]
description: The path turns in on itself here, following the outcropping in the canyon wall.  Small feathers litter the path, and looking up, nests can be seen nestled in to the face.  No sound can be heard above the wind, however.

The path turns in on itself here, following the outcropping in the canyon wall.  Small feathers litter the path, and looking up, nests can be seen nestled in to the face.  The faint peeping of young birds can be heard above the wind.
